ComicInfo.Title: Might Makes Wight Part II; Munchkin Cthulhu Comes For Us All!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Based on the popular game of the same name, the Munchkin comic gives you a whole new way to enjoy the world with Spyke and Flower. See how Spyke and Flower deal with the Wight Brothers' dungeon in "Might Makes Wight Part II," then struggle with your sanity in "Munchkin Cthulhu Comes For Us All!" Plus, an exclusive game card is included with every copy of the first printing!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Ian McGinty | 1 | Var | 1:20 Variant Cover | Chris Schweizer | 2 | RE | BOOM! Studios Exclusive Cover | Daniel Bayliss | Missing |
